Template.HtmlPart:
Hello,

If you requested to reset the password for your Ulangi account, please follow this link. Please note that the link expires {{expirationhours}} hour after this email was sent.

If you did not request to reset your password, please ignore this email.

Sincerely,
The Ulangi Team.
Template.TextPart:
Hello,
If you requested to reset the password for your Ulangi account,  please go to this link: {{resetpasswordlink}}.
Please note that the link expires {{expirationhours}} hour after this email was sent.
If you did not request to reset you password, please ignore this email.
Sincerely,
The Ulangi Team.
